name: David Uyi Val-Izevbigie
title: Fullstack Developer
summary: Fullstack Developer with 4+ years of experience architecting ERP, POS, and AI-driven inventory management platforms. Proficient in TypeScript, React Native, Apollo GraphQL, MySQL, and offline-first mobile systems. Passionate about scalable, secure, and intuitive solutions that improve business operations.

achievements: Architected and deployed ERP modules across inventory, POS, fixed asset management, and finance.
Developed AI-powered sales forecasting, stock optimization, and NLP-enhanced search features.
Built offline-first mobile and desktop apps with biometric login, budgeting tools, and PDF export functionality.
Designed and deployed a gamified goal-setting platform with XP rewards and multiplayer quests.
Integrated secure payment workflows with Flutterwave APIs for a multi-vendor eCommerce system.
Designed and launched an AI-powered inventory and POS system.
Built scalable backend architectures for batch inventory updates and loyalty programs.
Developed mobile apps with offline capabilities and PIN-based authentication.
Streamlined receipt generation with dynamic HTML templates and base64 encoding.
Delivered custom websites and ERP solutions tailored to client needs.
Integrated backend services and databases with responsive frontends.
Designed and maintained databases for dynamic web applications.
